info.title: Slack Search API
info.description: The API for management Slack Searchs

get.summary: Searches for messages and files matching a query.
get.description: Searches for messages and files matching a query.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of items to return per page.

parameters.name: highlight
parameters.description: Pass a value of 1 to enable query highlight markers (see below).

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number of results to return.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Search query. May contains booleans, etc.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Return matches sorted by either score or timestamp.

parameters.name: sort_dir
parameters.description: Change sort direction to ascending (asc) or descending (desc).

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: Authentication token (Requires scope: search:read)

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Search query. May contain booleans, etc.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Return matches sorted by either score or timestamp.

parameters.name: sort_dir
parameters.description: Change sort direction to ascending (asc) or descending (desc).

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: Authentication token (Requires scope: search:read)
